basic.name: Reverse String
basic.directions: Given a string, return a new string with the reversed order of characters
solutions: Turn into array, reverse it and turn into string
Create empty string and insert each character of str to the start of that string
Turn into array and use reduce

basic.name: Add
basic.directions: Return the sum of two numbers
solutions: Add the first argument to the second argument

basic.name: Subtract
basic.directions: Return the subtraction of two numbers
solutions: Subtract the first argument to the second argument
